Text.Page:
Feeling thirsty, ?

Let me introduce you to the Freeholds Specialty drink!
You learned about the Freeholds Specialty drink just when your thirst hit its peak.

Greetings . Are you enjoying the festival?

Please allow me to teach you how to make a Freeholds Specialty drink.

Why don't you try one first?

How was it? Every single drop was delicious, right?

Trust me, it wasn't easy finding the right combination of flavors. To make a Freeholds Specialty drink for yourself, you need a special ingredient.

Here's the recipe.
